entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 04:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.9°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
